name: The file system of EFS
title: The file system of EFS
body:

Title

Overview of EFS folders

Short Text

the EFS installations have a lot of folders from the build and beside that, too..

Author

Owner

Category

overviewGreen

Status

REFACTORING NEEDEDRed

Publishing date

Reviewed last

ToDos

 1 incomplete Add page properties 2 incomplete Restructure page 3 incomplete Check if ToC is needed 4 incomplete Add abstract paragraph
17

List of folders and files included in an EFS Build

Folder name

description

conf

conf = configuration; includes the configuration files of the installation

conf/config.inc.php3

the main configuration file of the installation; must not be deleted!

conf/musterconfig.inc.php3

template for the main configuration file; is used to initially set up the configuration file

conf/hostnames.inc.php

includes information about the hostnames of the installation; must not be deleted!

VERSION

includes the information about the EFS version the installation uses; only is available if the installation is in the rom (roll out management); must not be deleted!

enter gui_gui

 

fm

fm= filemanager; includes files needed by EFS Secure exchange module;

gp

gp=globalpark; is used for dumping in the EFS database; if it exists in an installation, it should be deleted (after making sure that it currently is not used by the colleagues)

layout

includes layout files of the installation

mobile_gui

 

modules

includes files of the separate EFS modules

modules/efs

includes files of the efs module

modules/efs/module.inc.php

there always is a centralized module.inc.php describing the module

modules/employee

includes files of the employee module

modules/survey

includes files of the survey module

modules/panel

includes files of the panel module

panelwebsite

is needed by EFS Panel module and includes the panelwebsite

panelwebsite/assets_themes

 

panelwebsite/assets_websites

includes image files uploaded for a panel website/language version

panelwebsite/install

includes files needed to initially install a panel website

panelwebsite/s

includes filders and files of panel surveys

public

 

qtool

includes files needed by the qtool (=Qualitative Analysis) module

report

includes files needed for the EFS Survey Status module; [Installation]/report

reporting

includes files needen by the EFS Reporting+ module

service

includes files needed by the service layer

smm

smm= Social Media Monitoring; includes files needed by the EFS SMM module; module is deprecated and no longer included in EFS versions >=10.7

static_directories

 

support

includes files needed by the technical support team

translations

includes files needed by the EFS Translations module and GUI and offers the possibility to translate text elements of surveys; [Installation_name]/translations

uc

uc=umfragecenter; includes folders and files of each survey (except for panel surveys)

uc/__panel

 

uc/stub.html

file needed by system administration/their monitoring to execute a ping on to check wether the installation is reachable

uc/stub.php

file needed by system administration/their monitoring to execute a ping on to check wether the installation is reachable

uc/[primary_team_name]/[generic_project_folder_name]

includes all files of a survey

uc/[primary_team_name]/[generic_project_folder_name]/images

includes image files of the project

uc/[primary_team_name]/[generic_project_folder_name]/layout

includes layout files (images) uploaded into the media library of the project

uc/[primary_team_name]/[generic_project_folder_name]/templates

includes template files of the project

wcp

includes third party libraries

www

includes files neded by the EFS admin area GUI; [Installation_name]/www

www/support/dbreport

file to create statistics about an installation and to optimize special tables; is executed by a cron job every night

www/include/class_ospe_new.inc.php3

ospe = online survey processing engine

www/support

includes further files needed by the technical support team

www/support/healself.php

the 'healself# file that is executed after updates and upgrades to adjust database and filesystem changes

www/support/fix_inconsistencies.php

if executed, fixes inconsistencies found on the installation

www/support/jobmaker.php3

file to execute the jobs queue; is executed by a cron job every 10 minutes

www/support/snailmail.php

file to execute mail delivery; is executed by a cron job every 10 minutes

www/support/testinstallation.php

file to execute the installation check

Screenshots of the list of folders

No ROM:
